messages.title: 4 Reasons to vote Labour
messages.content:
1. A hardworking, local candidate you can trust. It’s time your MP represented you and not the vested interest of Westminster.
2. Our public services will not survive under the Conservatives. The NHS is in crisis, School budgets are being slashed and our Police and Fire Services are being cut.
3. Only Labour can deliver an exit from the European Union that protects jobs, workers' rights and guarantees that EU citizens currently living in the UK have the right to stay.
4. Only Labour can challenge the Tories and deliver a Government that works for the many, not the few.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight for the best of Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Brexit that protects jobs, workers' rights and guarantees that EU citizens currently living in the UK have the right to stay.
Reverse cuts to police and fire service numbers. Fight for emergency services across Welwyn Hatfield. The NHS is in crisis. Labour will always put public services first.
Deserve more than an ambitious, aspiring career politician who, despite entering Parliament via the party list, thinks he should parachute into our area through a by-election.

issues.brexitEurope: Only Labour can deliver an exit from the European Union that protects jobs, workers' rights and guarantees that EU citizens currently living in the UK have the right to stay.
issues.health: The NHS is in crisis. Labour will always put public services first.
issues.lawCrime: Reverse cuts to police and fire service numbers.

community.content: Fight for emergency services across Welwyn Hatfield.

quotes.text: We have a real chance to change things in Welwyn Hatfield, join our movement.
